item.title: Adriana add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Adriana add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Adriana add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Why should we take advice on sex from the pope? If he knows anything about it, he shouldn't!" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Adriana add a quote by AnaÃ¯s Nin
item.description: "I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naÃ¯ve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman." -- AnaÃ¯s Nin

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody. " -- Jane Austen

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "I don't have to agree with you to like you or respect you." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "Vegetarians, and their Hezbollah-like splinter faction, the vegans ... are the enemy of everything good and decent in the human spirit." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "No one understands and appreciates the American Dream of hard work leading to material rewards better than a non-American. " -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "Do we really want to travel in hermetically sealed popemobiles through the rural provinces of France, Mexico and the Far East, eating only in Hard Rock Cafes and McDonalds? Or do we want to eat without fear, tearing into the local stew, the humble taqueria's mystery meat, the sincerely offered gift of a lightly grilled fish head? I know what I want. I want it all. I want to try everything once." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "I lurched away from the table after a few hours feeling like Elvis in Vegas - fat, drugged, and completely out of it." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "I've long believed that good food, good eating, is all about risk. Whether we're talking about unpasteurized Stilton, raw oysters or working for organized crime 'associates,' food, for me, has always been an adventure" -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "your body is not a temple, it's an amusement park. Enjoy the ride." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Anthony Bourdain
item.description: "I could eat bloody Elvis - if you put enough vinegar on him." -- Anthony Bourdain

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs." -- Charlotte Bronte

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "And so the lion fell in love with the lambâ¦" he murmured. I looked away, hiding my eyes as I thrilled to the word. "What a stupid lamb," I sighed. "What a sick, masochistic lion." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Kathleen Tessaro
item.description: "If you can capture a woman's imagination, then you will have her. But imagination is a strange creature. It needs time and distance to function properly." -- Kathleen Tessaro
